FuncDef: The display cpu-defend host-car drop-packet record command displays records of packet loss caused by user-level rate limiting. The display cpu-defend host-car drop-packet record command displays records of packet loss caused by user-level rate limiting.
CLIs: display cpu-defend host-car drop-packet record [ car-id <car-id> ] [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a bucket.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 8191.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.
